```

  ✖ Do not assign variables in loop conditions.

  > 1 │ for (let i = 1; i = 10; i++) {
      │                 ^^^^^^
    2 │   console.log('foo');
    3 │ }

  ℹ It is a common typo to mistype an equality operator as an assignment operator.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
```
